The Shire Chamber of Commerce

The Shire Chamber of Commerce Target Audience Color Scheme Typography

Typography

The typography creates the feel and style of The Shire. The larger h1, h2 use a strong font, that is charming and characteristic of The Shire. The h3 font is more whimiscal, but styled in green, similar to the h2 to reflect the earthy, happy feeling of The Shire. The body is styled in an easy to read font, making the user experience easy to read and find information.

This is the H1 style: font

This is the H2 style: font 'IM Fell Great Primer'

This is the H3 style: 'Bilbo Swash Caps'

This is the paragraph style, including the font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
